name: unistr
description: Postgres: Evaluate escaped Unicode characters in the argument

name: bool_and
description: True if all values are true

name: bool_or
description: True if any value is true

name: encode
description: Encode binary data to text representation

name: initcap
description: Capitalize first letter of each word

name: pg_typeof
description: Get data type of any value

name: round
description: Round to nearest integer or decimal
